title: Is We Dumb? | Squatter. Sex Socks. Chumbawamba. Friendly Nibble.
description:
Have you ever robbed a bank and then proceeded to deposit the same money you just stole directly back into that same bank immediately afterwards? Let's talk about that, putting a speaker on a dildo, breaking your arm while shoveling snow, mashing an artillery shell up your butt, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube:  https://youtu.be/UKKK22TbAuk

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com
